content.html: As a very lonely, gay, British teenager, the portrayal of Seven of Nine in #startrekvoyager got me through. To watch the character come full circle and sit in her rightful chair in #startrekpicard was cathartic and utterly magnificent. Thank you so much, Captain @JeriLRyan.
content.value: As a very lonely, gay, British teenager, the portrayal of Seven of Nine in #startrekvoyager got me through. To watch the character come full circle and sit in her rightful chair in #startrekpicard was cathartic and utterly magnificent. Thank you so much, Captain @JeriLRyan.
